title: Book a Flight for an Unaccompanied Minor
description: A parent needs to book a flight for their 10-year-old child who will be traveling alone.

tasks.description: Explain the airline's policy and fees for unaccompanied minors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the rules and costs associated with the service.

tasks.description: Collect the required information for the child, the parent dropping them off, and the adult picking them up.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary contact and identification details.

tasks.description: Book the flight and the unaccompanied minor service, and complete the required forms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the flight and service, providing the parent with a confirmation and completed forms.
